import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import { Context } from '../Context'; import Texts from '../Texts'; import logoWhite from '../images/logoWhite.png'; import panner1 from '../images/panner1.PNG' import panner2 from '../images/panner2.PNG' export default function Main() { const { lang } = useContext(Context); const texts = Texts[lang]; useEffect(() => { const script = document.createElement('script'); script.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); }, []); return (
